data.lyric:
[ti:Reminds Me Of You (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD/The Kid LAROI]
[al:Reminds Me Of You (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Reminds Me Of You (Explicit) - Juice WRLD/The Kid LAROI
[00:00.42]Lyrics by：Jarad Anthony Higgins/Charlton Howard/Lukasz Gottwald/Sean Small/Sam Sumser/Theron Thomas/Aaron Joseph/Kim Petras
[00:00.85]The Kid LAROI：
[00:00.94]I can't play that song 'cause it reminds me of you
[00:03.99]I can't watch that show 'cause it reminds me of you
[00:07.23]I can't even go there it reminds me of you
[00:10.38]I don't wanna do that it reminds me of you
[00:13.54]Cut off all of my friends 'cause they remind me of you
[00:16.82]I can't drink again 'cause I'm reminded of you
[00:20.05]I don't wanna do s**t that reminds me of you
[00:23.30]Everything and everywhere reminds me of you
[00:26.43]I know we can't be together ever again
[00:28.96]You told me this forever I ain't know forever could end
[00:32.18]You had me f**ked up had me thinkin' I would die here for you
[00:35.44]S**t got me f**ked up can't believe I was so blinded by you
[00:39.03]But I don't wanna cry
[00:41.20]Got my finger on the trigger and I'm thinking 'bout a homicide
[00:45.48]I feel like I could die
[00:47.65]Maybe if it was all over I could have you in another life
[00:51.95]I can't play that song 'cause it reminds me of you
[00:55.22]I can't watch that show 'cause it reminds me of you
[00:58.42]I can't even go there it reminds me of you
[01:01.56]I don't wanna do that it reminds me of you
[01:04.73]Cut off all of my friends 'cause they remind me of you
[01:07.90]I can't drink again 'cause I'm reminded of you
[01:11.23]I don't wanna do s**t that reminds me of you
[01:14.43]Everything and everywhere reminds me of you
[01:16.99]Juice WRLD：
[01:17.31]Gotta step out get some fresh air
[01:20.10]Posted in the club saw you pull up with your rebound
[01:23.18]Remind me again uh who kicked who out whose house
[01:26.29]Remind me again uh who's f**kin' on who now
[01:29.60]Oh
[01:30.32]Fightin' for my heart and baby I never lose
[01:33.54]No I can't get high 'cause it reminds me of you
[01:36.35]If you ever needed me girl I was flyin' to you
[01:39.61]Told you that I loved you girl I wasn't lyin' to you
[01:43.22]Fightin' for my heart and baby I never lose
[01:46.30]No I can't get high 'cause it reminds me of you
[01:49.17]If you ever needed me girl I was flyin' to you
[01:52.40]Told you that I loved you girl I wasn't lyin' to you
[01:57.76]The Kid LAROI：
[01:59.32]I can't play that song 'cause it reminds me of you
[02:02.34]I can't watch that show 'cause it reminds me of you
[02:05.56]I can't even go there it reminds me of you
[02:08.78]I don't wanna do that it reminds me of you
[02:11.98]Cut off all of my friends 'cause they remind me of you
[02:15.09]I can't drink again 'cause I'm reminded of you
[02:18.39]I don't wanna do s**t that reminds me of you
[02:21.61]Everything and everywhere reminds me of you
data.trans:
[ti:Reminds Me Of You (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD/The Kid LAROI]
[al:Reminds Me Of You (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.42]//
[00:00.85]//
[00:00.94]我不能放起那首歌 因为它会让我想起你
[00:03.99]我不能看那个节目 因为它会让我想起你
[00:07.23]我甚至不能重游那片土地 我会因此想起你
[00:10.38]我不想那样做 那会让我想起你
[00:13.54]跟我所有朋友断了联系 因为他们会让我想起你
[00:16.82]我不能再沾一滴酒 因为我的思念会被勾起
[00:20.05]我想避免任何 让你再次浮现脑海的事
[00:23.30]万事万物 角角落落 全都是你的身影
[00:26.43]我知道我们不能再一起生活
[00:28.96]你向我许诺过天长地久 我没想到天长地久也有尽头
[00:32.18]你让我变得一团糟 让我以为自己就要为你而死
[00:35.44]让我变得这样糟糕 不敢相信自己被你蒙蔽了眼睛
[00:39.03]但我不想哭
[00:41.20]我的手指扣上了扳机 我想要结束自己的生命
[00:45.48]我感觉我就要死去
[00:47.65]或许 如果一切结束 我会在来生与你在一起
[00:51.95]我不能放起那首歌 因为它会让我想起你
[00:55.22]我不能看那个节目 因为它会让我想起你
[00:58.42]我甚至不能重游那片土地 我会因此想起你
[01:01.56]我不想那样做 那会让我想起你
[01:04.73]跟我所有朋友断了联系 因为他们会让我想起你
[01:07.90]我不能再沾一滴酒 因为我的思念会被勾起
[01:11.23]我想避免任何 让你再次浮现脑海的事
[01:14.43]万事万物 角角落落 全都是你的身影
[01:16.99]//
[01:17.31]我得走出去 呼吸新鲜空气
[01:20.10]在俱乐部 看着你摆动身体
[01:23.18]又让我想起 是谁把谁赶出了自己的家门
[01:26.29]又让我想起 现在是谁在伤谁的心
[01:29.60]//
[01:30.32]为我的心还有我的爱人而战 我从未失败
[01:33.54]不 我不能太过兴奋 因为那样我会想起你
[01:36.35]在你需要我的时候 女孩 我都是为你飞奔而去
[01:39.61]告诉过你我爱你 女孩 我没有对你说谎
[01:43.22]为我的心还有我的爱人而战 我从未失败
[01:46.30]不 我不能太过兴奋 因为那样我会想起你
[01:49.17]在你需要我的时候 女孩 我都是为你飞奔而去
[01:52.40]告诉过你我爱你 宝贝 我没有对你说谎
[01:57.76]//
[01:59.32]我不能放起那首歌 因为它会让我想起你
[02:02.34]我不能看那个节目 因为它会让我想起你
[02:05.56]我甚至不能重游那片土地 那会让我想起你
[02:08.78]我不想那样做 那会让我想起你
[02:11.98]跟我所有朋友断了联系 因为他们会让我想起你
[02:15.09]我不能再沾一滴酒 因为我的思念会被勾起
[02:18.39]我想避免任何 让你再次浮现脑海的事
[02:21.61]万事万物 每个角落 全都是你的身影
